name: one night at cousins house
description: youve been told to babysit your younger cousin, but somehting seems off. theres weird splotch marks that yell at you, and you seem to be the only sane life there. your cousin is trying to keep you in, and leech all of your belognings off of you. will you be able to figure out how to escape, or will you give in, and let your cousin play with you . forever.
